title: Sharkreach's Smith, Harrington, on Influencer Marketing (Audio)
itunes:title: Sharkreach's Smith, Harrington, on Influencer Marketing (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Sharkreach CEO Steve Smith and board member Kevin Harrington - original Shark from ABC's "Shark Tank" - discuss the boom in “influencer marketing,” reaching millenials, and their latest acquisition of Mastermind.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
